materialViewer.hql: select projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, count(distinct(neworder)) neworderuser, projectid id, dtime date from ( select projectid, if(activitychannelid is null, 'none',activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t.activityid is null, 'none', t.activityid) activityid, 'ALL' platformid, t.date dtime, if(t.actiontype in (1,3),t.identityid,null) neworder from video.t_cdr_top_order_info t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' union all select projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, if(t.activityid is null, 'none', t.activityid) activityid, 'ALL' platformid, t.date dtime, if(t.actiontype in (1,3),t.identityid,null) neworder from video.t_cdr_top_order_info t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' union all select projectid, if(activitychannelid is null, 'none',activitychannelid) activitychannelid, 'ALL' activityid, 'ALL' platformid, t.date dtime, if(t.actiontype in (1,3),t.identityid,null) neworder from video.t_cdr_top_order_info t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' union all select projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, 'ALL' activityid, 'ALL' platformid, t.date dtime, if(t.actiontype in (1,3),t.identityid,null) neworder from video.t_cdr_top_order_info t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' union all select t.c1 projectid, if(t.activitychannelid is null, 'none', t.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, 'ALL' activityid, if(t.platformid is null, 'none', t.platformid) platformid, t.date dtime, userid neworder from video.t_cdr_sdk_event_join_video_user t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' and eventname='buy_vip' union all select t.c1 projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, if(t.activityid is null, 'none', t.activityid) activityid, if(t.platformid is null, 'none', t.platformid) platformid, t.date dtime, userid neworder from video.t_cdr_sdk_event_join_video_user t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' and eventname='buy_vip' union all select t.c1 projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, 'ALL' activityid, if(t.platformid is null, 'none', t.platformid) platformid, t.date dtime, userid neworder from video.t_cdr_sdk_event_join_video_user t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' and eventname='buy_vip' union all select t.c1 projectid, if(t.activitychannelid is null, 'none', t.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t.activityid is null, 'none', t.activityid) activityid, if(t.platformid is null, 'none', t.platformid) platformid, t.date dtime, userid neworder from video.t_cdr_sdk_event_join_video_user t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' and eventname='buy_vip' )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime
